header.author: Anonymous
header.title: AN ACCOUNT OF THE Vertues, Use, Dose, and wonderful manner of Operation OF THE Pilulæ Polychrestæ. Which Speedily and Safely extirpate those Opprobria's of Physicians, the Gout, Madness and Melancholy of all Sorts, Stone and Gravel in the Kidneys, &c. herein specified.
